name: RadioGroupRoot
description: Provides the root context for a radio group with selectable radio buttons. Renders a <div> element.

props.name: className
props.description:
CSS class applied to the element, or a function that
returns a class based on the component’s state.

props.name: name
props.description: Identifies the field when a form is submitted.

props.name: orientation
props.description: Use the orientation prop to change the layout direction of the radio group

props.name: defaultValue
props.description:
The uncontrolled value of the radio button that should be initially selected.

To render a controlled radio group, use the `value` prop instead.

props.name: disabled
props.description: Whether the component should ignore user interaction.

props.name: value
props.description:
The controlled value of the radio item that should be currently selected.

To render an uncontrolled radio group, use the `defaultValue` prop instead.

props.name: readOnly
props.description: Whether the user should be unable to select a different radio button in the group.

props.name: required
props.description: Whether the user must choose a value before submitting a form.

props.name: size
props.description: Use the size prop to change the gap between radio buttons

props.name: render
props.description:
Allows you to replace the component’s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.

props.name: inputRef
props.description: A ref to access the hidden input element.

props.name: onValueChange
props.description: Callback fired when the value changes.
